Package semsim.utilities

Class ResourcesManager

java.lang.Object
semsim.utilities.ResourcesManager
public class ResourcesManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class for reading files either outside or inside the SemSim package and organizing the info in lookup tables, reference sets, etc.
Author:
mneal

    • createHashMapFromFile

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String[]> createHashMapFromFile​(java.lang.String path, boolean usecommaseparator) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Read contents of a file into a HashMap. Semi-colon indicates separator between key String and the key's values.
      Parameters:
      path - Path to file
      usecommaseparator - Whether to use the comma character as the separator between entries in the String[] part of the mapping
      Returns:
      HashMap that relates a String key with an array of String values
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • createHashMapFromResource

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String[]> createHashMapFromResource​(java.lang.String internalpath, boolean usecommaseparator) throws java.io.IOException
      For loading HashMaps from resources internally stored in SemSim packages
      Parameters:
      internalpath - Internal path to file
      usecommaseparator - Whether to use the comma character to create separate the elements of the String[] object in a mapping.
      Returns:
      A HashMap that relates a String index to a String array.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • createHashMapFromBaseUnitFile

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>,​java.lang.String[]> createHashMapFromBaseUnitFile​(java.lang.String path) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Reader for base unit to OPB class mapping file
      Parameters:
      path - Path to file that indicates valid OPB physical property classes for fundamental physical unit combinations
      Returns:
      Table that indicates valid OPB physical property classes for certain combinations of fundamental physical units
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

      Get externally-stored info about reference ontologies used in annotation
      Parameters:
      cfgpath - Path to file containing formatted ontology descriptions
      Returns:
